scripts.postinstall: npm run gateway-api && npm run greetings-api
scripts.gateway-api:generate: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i bff-gateway.openapi.json -g typescript-angular --type-mappings AnyType=any --additional-properties=serviceSuffix=Api,npmName=@c4-soft/gateway-api,npmVersion=0.0.1,stringEnums=true,enumPropertyNaming=camelCase,supportsES6=true,withInterfaces=true --remove-operation-id-prefix -o projects/c4-soft/gateway-api
scripts.gateway-api:build: npm run gateway-api:generate && npm run ng -- build @c4-soft/gateway-api --configuration production
scripts.gateway-api: npm run gateway-api:generate && npm run gateway-api:build
scripts.greetings-api:generate: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i bff-greetings-api.openapi.json -g typescript-angular --type-mappings AnyType=any --additional-properties=serviceSuffix=Api,npmName=@c4-soft/greetings-api,npmVersion=0.0.1,stringEnums=true,enumPropertyNaming=camelCase,supportsES6=true,withInterfaces=true --remove-operation-id-prefix -o projects/c4-soft/greetings-api
scripts.greetings-api:build: npm run greetings-api:generate && npm run ng -- build @c4-soft/greetings-api --configuration production
scripts.greetings-api: npm run greetings-api:generate && npm run greetings-api:build
